api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://taobao-tmall-scraper-v2.p.rapidapi.com/771502619956"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "taobao-tmall-scraper-v2.p.rapidapi.com"

import requests
